info.title: Shorticle
info.description: Shorticle is an article summarization tool capable of summarising web articles to a custom variable length, picking article's title and main image, fetching article's social shares and detecting language. Shorticle can work with shortened URLs. Shorticle uses advanced algorithms to determine sentence value (based on article keywords) and sentence relationship to ensure that sentences used in summary are comprehensible and cover the entire scope of the article.

get.description: Endpoint to fetch article summary, main image and social shares

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Determines whether Shorticle will attempt to detect the language used in the article.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of paragraphs to be returned. Minimum value is 1 and max is 10. Default Value is 5.

parameters.name: return_content
parameters.description: Determines whether Shorticle  will return body text/content.

parameters.name: show_images
parameters.description: Determines whether Shorticle should return the article's main image.

parameters.name: social_shares
parameters.description: Determines whether Shorticle should return the social media shares (Facebook, Google+ or Twitter) from given URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL resource from which to summarize article.
